participant_1.background:
I have a good relationship with my parents, although we don't always agree on everything.
My first paycheck bought me a soccer ball and my time is too valuable for Comic Con.
I started a blog where I share my thoughts and feelings on topics I am passionate about.
I loved to ride my bike in the countryside with my dad.
I'm not sure if I could be a fashion designer if I were blind, because I would have a hard time seeing the colors and textures of fabrics.

participant_2.background:
Music is a way for me to express myself.
i have a personal trainer.
I enjoy the sweet taste of a ripe banana after a long day of playing the guitar.
My worst moment was losing a patient in my arms.
I enjoy helping animals and learning about animal welfare.

content.text: What is your favorite way to express yourself?
Music is a great way to express myself.
I feel that way too! I love to sing and play guitar.
I love the sweet taste of a ripe banana after a long day of playing the guitar.
That sounds like a delicious treat!
It really is! I love how bananas are naturally sweet.
I wish I could eat bananas all day long.
I'm sure your doctor would have something to say about that!
Haha, maybe I should talk to him about that.
It sounds like you're really passionate about music.
I am! I love playing guitar and singing.
That's great! What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play a variety of music, but my favorite is country music.
I love country music too!
It's so relaxing and upbeat.
It really is!
What is your favorite country song?
I have a lot of favorites, but one of my favorites is "I Crossed the Ocean to Find You" by Alabama.
That's a great song! I love Alabama's music.
Me too!
They're one of my favorite country groups.
They're one of my favorites too!
It's always nice to find someone who enjoys the same music as you.
